CategoryTree:4.description: <h3>What Is the Best Men's Dress Watch?</h3> <p>Some of the top men's dress watches include:</p> <ul> <li>Blancpain Vileret Extra Thin</li> <li>Breguet Classique 5177</li> <li>Cartier Tank Américaine</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/jaeger-lecoultre-watches.html">Jaeger-LeCoultre</a> Master Control Memovox</li> <li>Jaeger-LeCoultre Reverso Tribute</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/junghans-watches.html">Junghans</a> Max Bill</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/maurice-lacroix-watches.html">Maurice Lacroix</a> Eliros Date</li> <li>Montblanc Héritage Chronométrie</li> <li>Patek Philippe Calatrava</li> <li>Seiko Presage Sharp Edged Series</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/ulysse-nardin-watches.html">Ulysse Nardin</a> Marine Chronometer</li> <li>Vacheron Constantin Traditionnelle Perpetual Calendar</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/zenith-watches.html">Zenith</a> Elite Classic</li> </ul> <h3>What Is the Standard Men's Watch Size?</h3> <p>Fancy watches for men from premier brands average between 37 and 39 mm, though sport watches are usually a bit bigger, between 40 and 42 mm.</p> <h3>What Is the Standard Men's Watch Band Length?</h3> <p>Top watch brands for men don't have one uniform standard for band length, but most commonly, the bands on men's watches are between 7¾ inches and 9½ inches long.</p> <h3>Are Men's Watches Getting Smaller?</h3> <p>There has been a downsizing trend in the world of expensive watches for men, veering away from the large sports watches that were popular a few years ago. Small sizes, between 32 mm and 36 mm, have become much more common in recent years than they used to be.</p> <h3>What Kind of Watch Does Not Require a Battery?</h3> <p>Mechanical watches do not require a battery: They use traditional mechanisms that store energy using a spring. Many top watches for men are mechanical. They may either be hand-wound (manual), meaning that you need to wind them regularly, or self-winding (automatic), meaning that they are engineered to use the energy of your body's natural movement to wind the spring.</p> <h3>What Men's Watches Hold Their Value?</h3> <p>The best luxury branded watches for men can hold their value long after they were originally sold and may even appreciate in value. The top brands to look for if you want to buy watches as an investment include:</p> <ul> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/audemars-piguet-watches.html">Audemars Piguet</a>: The Royal Oak model is particularly coveted, especially if you find one from the 1970s.</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/cartier-watches.html">Cartier</a>: Collectors love models like the Tank and the Santos from Cartier.</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/patek-philippe-watches.html">Patek Philippe</a>: Since their watches are hand-crafted, they are made in limited numbers, making them far more difficult to find.</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/rolex.html">Rolex</a>: This is possibly the most famous watch brand, with a long history of creating premium products that collectors love.</li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/vacheron-constantin-watches.html">Vacheron Constantin</a>: This brand is among the oldest watch-makers in the world.</li> </ul> <h2>Buy Men's Watches You'll Love for Less</h2> <p>At Jomashop, we have nice watches for men with expensive taste at discount prices, so you can wear what you love without paying retail. We also carry a range of other luxury goods, like designer handbags, high-end sunglasses, and jewelry, all at prices far below those you'll find elsewhere. And we guarantee the authenticity of our products, so you can shop online with confidence. Buy stylish men's watches at great prices today!</p>

CategoryTree:871.description: <style> @media screen and (min-width: 1280px) { #what-is-the-best-online-watch-store- { padding-top: 310px; } #luxury-designer-watch-faqs { padding-top: 50px; } } </style> <h3 id="what-is-the-best-online-watch-store-">What Is the Best Online Watch Store?</h3> <p>Jomashop is the best place to buy watches online, thanks to our enormous selection of top-quality designer watches as well as our exceptional customer service. We make it easy to find a watch online from a premium brand at a discount price! At Jomashop, we pride ourselves on providing the best service, and we stand behind every product we sell by providing a warranty to give you added peace of mind.</p> <h3 id="where-can-i-buy-inexpensive-luxury-watches-online-">Where Can I Buy Inexpensive Luxury Watches Online?</h3> <p>Jomashop is the best place to buy inexpensive watches from all of the industry's top luxury brands, from A. Lange & Sohne to Zodiac! We have the best prices on new watches, and we also offer <a href="https://www.jomashop.com/preowned.html">pre-owned</a> watches to help you fit the timepiece you love into your budget.</p> <h3 id="is-it-safe-to-buy-luxury-watches-online-">Is it Safe to Buy Luxury Watches Online?</h3> <p>Yes, just like when you buy anything else online, while watch shopping it's important to find a trustworthy watch dealer. We can't speak for any other online watch shop, but we can tell you that it's 100% safe to buy a watch from Jomashop. We only sell authentic products, and every luxury watch on sale on our website comes with a warranty to ensure your satisfaction.</p> <h3 id="is-it-safe-to-buy-from-jomashop-">Is it Safe to Buy From Jomashop?</h3> <p>Absolutely! When you buy new fine watches for sale on our site, you'll get a high-quality timepiece that's guaranteed to be authentic. These aren't factory seconds, replicas, or refurbished models: They're brand-new, top-quality designer watches sourced from authorized dealers and respected distributors. We also digitally encrypt all transactions with the latest security technology to ensure that your personal information is kept safe.</p> <h3 id="which-watches-hold-their-value-">Which Watches Hold Their Value?</h3> <p>If you are looking to buy luxury watches as an investment, look out for these brands:</p> <ul> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/rolex.html">Rolex</a>: Perhaps the most famous watch brand, Rolex has a long history of creating premium timepieces. Purpose-built models like the Submariner are especially popular among collectors. </li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/patek-philippe-watches.html">Patek Philippe</a>: This company's hand-crafted watches are made in very limited numbers, so they're highly sought-after. One Patek Philippe watch set the record for the <a href="https://robbreport.com/style/watch-collector/this-31m-patek-philippe-is-now-the-most-expensive-watch-in-the-world-2879669/">most expensive watch</a> ever sold at auction, bringing in more than $31 million! </li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/cartier.html">Cartier</a>: This brand is known for a variety of luxury goods, including premium watches. Some of the most prized models include the Tank and the Santos. </li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/vacheron-constantin-watches.html">Vacheron Constantin</a>: While this brand may not be as famous as some others, it's one of the oldest in the world. They've been making watches since 1755! The Overseas is a modern classic that's becoming increasingly popular with collectors. </li> <li><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/audemars-piguet-watches.html">Audemars Piguet</a>: The Royal Oak stands out as the most coveted model from Audemars Piguet, especially if you can lay your hands on a vintage one from the 1970s. New timepieces from this highly regarded brand also command a premium from investors. </li> </ul>

CategoryTree:50.description: <style> @media screen and (min-width: 1280px) { #faq-spacer { padding-top: 310px; } } </style> <h3 id="faq-spacer">What Are the Best Sunglasses for the Money?</h3> <p><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/ray-ban.html">Ray-Ban</a> makes consistently high-quality shades, so they've earned a reputation for being well worth the cost, even at retail. <a href="https://www.jomashop.com/maui-jim-sunglasses.html">Maui Jim's high-end sunglasses</a> also stand out for being functional, durable, and fashionable. Of course, no matter which designer sunglasses you purchase, you'll always get the best value when you buy them from Jomashop.</p> <h3>What Are the Most Expensive Men's Sunglasses?</h3> <p>The most expensive sunglasses in the world were made by <a href="https://www.jomashop.com/chopard.html">Chopard</a> in partnership with De Rigo Vision. These unique shades have frames made of 24-karat gold inlaid with 51 hand-cut 4-carat river diamonds. They're valued at more than $400,000. Thankfully, you don't need to pay nearly that much for a pair of high-quality sunglasses of your own!</p> <h3>Are Discount Sunglasses as Good as Expensive Ones?</h3> <p>The quality of discount sunglasses can vary depending on exactly what you're buying. Low-priced drugstore shades may not offer adequate UV protection, and they can also scratch or break easily. But if you buy expensive designer sunglasses at a discount, you'll be getting the same premium quality at a lower price, meaning they'll be just as good as if you had paid more.</p> <h3>What Sunglasses Are in Style Now?</h3> <p>Eyewear trends include sportier frames with a sleek aesthetic, retro sunglasses with brightly colored round lenses, rectangular frames, angular cat-eye shapes, extra-large lenses, tinted aviators, and blue-light glasses.</p> <h3>Are Designer Sunglasses Polarized?</h3> <p>Designer sunglasses come in both polarized and non-polarized styles. <a href="https://www.aao.org/eye-health/glasses-contacts/polarized-lenses">Polarized lenses</a> can reduce the glare from reflective surfaces such as roads, cars, or water, but they do cost a little bit more.</p> <h3>Which Brand of Polarized Sunglasses Are the Best?</h3> <p><a href="https://www.jomashop.com/maui-jim-sunglasses.html">Maui Jim</a> stands out in the area of polarized shades: All of their products are polarized, and they even developed and patented their own polarization technology. Other top designer eyewear brands for polarized sunglasses include Costa del Mar, Oakley, and Ray-Ban.</p> <h3>Does Chanel Have Sunglasses?</h3> <p>Yes! <a href="https://www.jomashop.com/chanel.html">Chanel</a> has a wide array of stylish designer sunglasses that vary in color, shape, and size, so you can find the perfect pair of sunglasses to fit your style.</p> <h3>What Is a Good Price for Sunglasses?</h3> <p>Evaluating the prices of sunglasses requires you to factor in your own budget as well as the value of the product you're buying: You may be able to find a good pair of shades for less than $50, but for a low-quality pair, even $5 is too much. At Jomashop, we have authentic designer sunglasses on sale up to 80% off retail, with prices ranging from as little as $20 to as much as $650.</p> <h3>Are Designer Sunglasses Worth It?</h3> <p>As the saying goes, you get what you pay for: High-end designer sunglasses are usually made to be more durable as well as stylish, and you'll get high-quality eye protection, too. That said, just because name-brand sunglasses are worth the price doesn't mean that you should pay that much: When you order with Jomashop, you can buy sunglasses online that you're sure to love at affordable prices.</p> <h3>How Do You Clean Designer Sunglasses?</h3> <ul> <li>With clean hands, rinse your high-fashion sunglasses under lukewarm water to remove dust, dirt, and other debris.</li> <li>Apply a drop or two of dish soap to your fingertip and use it to clean each lens, gently rubbing both sides, and all parts of the frames.</li> <li>Rinse your sunglasses thoroughly to remove all traces of soap.</li> <li>Carefully dry them with a clean, lint-free towel.</li> </ul> <h3>Where Can I Buy Designer Sunglasses Online?</h3> <p>The best online sunglasses store is Jomashop: We sell a wide range of stylish shades from the top designer sunglasses brands at prices up to 80% below retail.</p> <h3>Are Jomashop Sunglasses Authentic?</h3> <p>Yes! We <a href="https://help.jomashop.com/articles/4806-are-your-watches-authentic/">guarantee</a> the authenticity of every product in our sunglasses shop as well as everything else we sell. We carry only 100% genuine discount sunglasses sourced from authorized dealers and respected distributors.</p> <h3>Does Jomashop Sell Real Oakleys?</h3> <p>Yes! We sell genuine <a href="https://www.jomashop.com/oakley-sunglasses.html">Oakleys</a> as well as many other high-end brands of designer shades.</p>

$ProductInterface:omega-watch-210-30-42-.html: Stainless steel case with a stainless steel bracelet. Uni-directional rotating stainless steel bezel with a black ceramic (count-up elapsed time) ring. Black dial with luminous rhodium-plated skeleton hands and dot hour markers. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 6 o'clock position. Omega calibre 8800 automatic movement, containing 35 Jewels, bitting at 25200 vph, and has a power reserve of approximately 55 hours. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal. Screw down crown. Transparent case back. Round case shape. Case size: 42 mm. case thickness: 14 mm. Band width: 20 mm. Deployment clasp with a push button release. Water resistant at 300 meters / 1000 feet. Functions: date, hour, minute, second, co-axial escapement, chronometer. Seamaster Series. Dive watch style. Watch label: Swiss Made. Omega Seamaster Automatic Chronometer Black Dial Men's Watch 210.30.42.20.01.001.
